DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the possible mechanisms by which cataract surgery aggravates meibomian gland dysfunction (MGD), the investigators evaluated the changes in tear cytokines and ocular surface parameters after cataract surgery according to the preoperative MGD grade.
DOC.brief_title: Meibomian Gland Dysfunction (MGD) and Tear Cytokines After Cataract Surgery According to Preoperative Meibomian Gland Status
DOC.criteria: males or nonpregnant females aged between 55 to 80 yearsold. had a history of ocular diseases, such as ocular infection, ocular allergy, and autoimmune disease, as well as patients with continuous use of topical ocular medications before surgery, or histories of ocular surgery or ocular injury.
